name: Shutterstock, Inc.
description: Shutterstock, Inc. is a leading global provider of high-quality licensed photographs, vectors, illustrations, and videos for creative professionals and businesses. Founded in 2003 by Jon Oringer, Shutterstock has evolved into a comprehensive platform that offers millions of assets, enabling users to create stunning visual content for marketing, advertising, and various digital channels. The company operates on a subscription model, providing flexible options for businesses of all sizes to access its extensive library of creative content. In addition to stock imagery, Shutterstock offers tools for video production, editorial images, and music licensing, catering to the diverse needs of content creators. With a focus on innovation, Shutterstock leverages advanced technology and artificial intelligence to enhance the user experience, making it easier for customers to discover and utilize the right assets for their projects. The company also emphasizes a commitment to diversity and inclusion, showcasing a wide range of perspectives in its content offerings. As a player in the creative industry, Shutterstock is dedicated to empowering artists and businesses to tell their stories visually and effectively.
headquarters: New York City, New York, USA

key_executives.name: David A. S. H. F. R. C. N. D. R. C. Z.

seo.meta_title: Shutterstock, Inc. | Stock Images, Videos, and Music
seo.meta_description: Explore Shutterstock, Inc., a leader in stock photography and creative content. Discover millions of images, videos, and music for your projects.

faq.question: What is Shutterstock known for?
faq.answer: Shutterstock is known for its extensive library of stock images, videos, and music for creative professionals.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Shutterstock?
faq.answer: Stan Pavlovsky is the CEO of Shutterstock, Inc.

faq.question: Where is Shutterstock headquartered?
faq.answer: Shutterstock is headquartered in New York City, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Shutterstock offer?
faq.answer: Shutterstock offers stock images, vectors, illustrations, stock videos, and music tracks.
